short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aggregate social media likes, upvotes and tweets for any link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get popularity information from Facebook, Reddit, Twitter and LinkedIn for any link without even clicking! Share any page to your favorite social medias with just two clicks!



You do NOT have to be signed in to any social media for Share All Happiness gather popularity information from Facebook, Reddit, Twitter and LinkedIn. Sharing requires you to log into the social media you want to share the link in. This is handled directly by your browser and the social media website, Share All Happiness does not support saving log in information.


We are always working on the next version of Share All Happiness and we welcome any feedback and ideas you may have.

Limitations:
Share All Happiness is heavily dependent on what the public APIs of various social media platforms make possible for third party applications to achieve. In other words, some links get more reliable information from the platforms than others.
